thread.title: Ground News - 9 flood alerts in place for Nottinghamshire as Storm Gerrit to bring more rain
thread.title_full: Ground News - 9 flood alerts in place for Nottinghamshire as Storm Gerrit to bring more rain

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - 9 flood alerts in place for Nottinghamshire as Storm Gerrit to bring more rain
text:
Summary by Ground News Flood warnings in place for the River Usk in Monmouthshire and the River Wye in Powys. Heavy showers and thundery showers expected in the west of the country. More rain expected over the next few days, but not as much as yesterday. The Met Office has issued a flood warning for parts of South Wales. Share menu More
Filters 7 Articles 7 Articles All Left Center Right
BBC News Center High Factuality Government: Government of the United Kingdom Staffordshire flood warnings in place as 'many rivers swollen' They apply in Staffordshire, after the Environment Agency said there was "fast-flowing" flood water in the Midlands.
